actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a refundable income tax credit for the purchase of new automobiles manufactured by domestic automobile companies.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers an income tax credit of $1,500 for purchasing between December 31, 1981, and January 1, 1984, a new 1981 or later model American-made passenger automobile.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a refundable income tax credit for the purchase of new automobiles manufactured by domestic automobile companies.
